title: Sr. Engineering Manager, Commerce & Growth Optimization - Apple Services Engineering
summary: People at Apple don’t just build products. They craft the kind of experiences that have revolutionized entire industries. The Apple Services Engineering team is one of the most exciting examples of Apple’s long-held passion for combining art and technology.
description: As an Engineering leader, you will play a crucial role in collaborating with cross-functional teams and leverage your technical expertise to deliver on organization’s vision & objectives. Develop an understanding for user behavior to create deeply enriching personalized experiences. In doing so, you will create new opportunities in the space of subscriptions, offerings and pricing.
key_qualifications: 15+ years of overall industry experience with 10+ years building & leading high-performing research & engineering teams. Deep experiences working across one or more platforms focused on Personalization, Commerce, Payment and Pricing. Expertise with systems handling data at scale, specifically with big data technologies such as Apache Spark, Hadoop, etc.
education_experience: PhD or Masters in Computer Science or similar engineering discipline, or equivalent industry experience
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $239,700 and $360,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan.
